div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `RelatedPerson` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `RelatedPerson`. Element `RelatedPerson` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.patient` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.patient`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.relationship` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.relationship`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.name` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.name`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.telecom` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.telecom`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.gender` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.gender`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.birthDate` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.birthDate`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.address` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.address`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.photo` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.photo`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.period`, but has no comparisons.
Element `RelatedPerson.communication` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.communication`, but has no comparisons.

Element `RelatedPerson.communication.language` is part of an existing definition because parent element `RelatedPerson.communication` requires a cross-version extension. Element `RelatedPerson.communication.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.communication.language`, but has no comparisons.

Element `RelatedPerson.communication.preferred` is part of an existing definition because parent element `RelatedPerson.communication` requires a cross-version extension. Element `RelatedPerson.communication.preferred` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RelatedPerson.communication.preferred`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
